A source said: Simon Cowell and Matt Cardle spoke over Christmas and texted ideas about what Matt Cardle wants to do. Simon Cowell has said that he wants him to write and co-write some songs. "They know they want great material, if the songs are penned by Matt Cardle then even better. He's chuffed.

of The X Factor in 2007. Discussing his boss with New! magazine, Dermot O'Leary praised Simon Cowell for having time for everyone. " Simon Cowell is a remarkably surprising, down-to-earth man," he said. You don't get that level of success if you haven't got a touch of normality. "He's very much a common man, someone you could go for a beer with and who you'd have no hesitation in talking to about anything at all. I clicked with him immediately. He is a really nice guy, not affected, and has time for everyone. He's a showman but his head's not in the clouds. He is not aloof. He added: " Simon Cowell is a businessman who makes some money and makes sure there are certain standards of performers there for a mass market." claimed that Simon Cowell is not the "ogre" some
